thread.title: Car

author: The Telegraph
title: Car
text: Affordable Car Hire offers vehicles to suit all tastes and activities. This exclusive discount is valid with more than 500 suppliers, including Hertz, Avis and Europcar, providing pickups from 15,210 locations worldwide. As one of the largest UK leisure car rental companies, Affordable Car Hire is committed to offering good value for money and excellent customer service. How to claim Click here and enter promo code ' telegraph35 ' to claim 35% off car hire worldwide. Terms and Conditions Bookings must be made between October 25 and November 30, 2015. Call centre bookings can be made from October 26, 2015. Valid for pick ups from November 1, 2015 to March 31, 2016. telegraph.co.uk
